# Fetch I (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Calling Spells|calling]])

**Level:** [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 4]], Unchained Summoner 4, [[4th Level Witch Spells|Witch 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 8th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 8]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, F/DF (a tiny bag and a small candle)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels) 

**Effect:** One summoned creature

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** City of Splendors, Waterdeep (WotC), pg. 153

As *[[Summon Monster I (Spell)|summon monster I]]*, except called creatures do not disappear at the end of the spellâ€™s duration. They do, however, become free-willed and outside the control of the caller after the spell expires.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Summoner 4, Unchained Summoner 4, Witch 4 to Level.
